valueType.name: Lock class
valueType.description: Name of the monitor's class.

valueType.name: Lock holder
valueType.description: The thread that held the monitor when the current thread blocked.

valueType.name: Last lock holder
valueType.description: The thread that held the monitor before the current thread woke up.

eventType.name: Java Wait
eventType.description: Thread waiting caused by a call to wait() on an object.

valueType.name: Lock class
valueType.description: Class name of the object wait() was called on.

valueType.name: Timeout
valueType.description: The timeout value used in the call to wait().

valueType.name: Timed out
valueType.description: Whether the wait timed out or not.

valueType.name: Notifier thread
valueType.description: The thread that notified the current thread.

eventType.name: Java Sleep
eventType.description: Thread waiting due to a call to Thread.sleep().

valueType.name: Sleep time
valueType.description: The time value used in the call to Thread.sleep()

eventType.name: JVM Blocked
eventType.description: Thread waiting on entering a JVM internal monitor.

valueType.name: Lock name
valueType.description: The name of the JVM internal monitor.

valueType.name: Holder thread
valueType.description: The thread that is currently holding the monitor.

valueType.name: Last lock holder
valueType.description: The thread that held the monitor before the current thread woke up.

eventType.name: JVM Wait
eventType.description: Thread waiting caused by a JVM internal call to wait().

valueType.name: Lock name
valueType.description: The name of the JVM internal monitor.

valueType.name: Timeout
valueType.description: The timeout value used in the call to wait().

valueType.name: Timed out
valueType.description: Whether the wait timed out or not.

valueType.name: Notifier thread
valueType.description: The thread that notified the current thread.

eventType.name: JVM Sleep
eventType.description: Thread waiting due to a JVM internal call to sleep().

valueType.name: Sleep time
valueType.description: The time value used in the call to sleep()

eventType.name: JVM Event Wait
eventType.description: Thread waiting for a JVM internal event.

valueType.name: Event name
valueType.description: The name of the event.

valueType.name: Timeout
valueType.description: The timeout value used in the event wait.

valueType.name: Timed out
valueType.description: Whether the wait timed out or not.

valueType.name: Signalling thread
valueType.description: The thread that signalled the event.

eventType.name: Socket Read
eventType.description: Thread waiting due to a read from a Socket.

valueType.name: Data read
valueType.description: The amount of data read from the socket in this call.

eventType.name: Socket Write
eventType.description: Thread waiting due to a write to a Socket.

valueType.name: Data written
valueType.description: The amount of data written to the socket in this call.

eventType.name: Thread Suspended
eventType.description: Thread was suspended. This is usually due to garbage collection or other VM internal events. It may also be caused by user calls to Thread.suspend() and JVMTI thread suspension calls.

valueType.name: Suspending thread
valueType.description: The thread that caused the suspension.

eventType.name: Class Load
eventType.description: Thread waiting for a class to be loaded by the JVM.

valueType.name: Class name
valueType.description: Name of the class being loaded.

eventType.name: Code Generation
eventType.description: Thread waiting for a method to be compiled by the JVM.

valueType.name: Method
valueType.description: Method being generated.

valueType.name: Optimization
valueType.description: Whether the method is being optimized or not.

eventType.name: Parked
eventType.description: Thread waiting because of a LockSupport.park() call.

valueType.name: Blocker class name
valueType.description: Name of the class causing the park (only Java SE 6.0 and higher).

valueType.name: Timeout
valueType.description: The timeout value used in the call to park().

valueType.name: Timed out
valueType.description: Whether the park timed out or not.

valueType.name: Unparking thread
valueType.description: The thread that called unpark() on this thread.

eventType.name: File Read
eventType.description: Thread waiting due to a read from a File or FileChannel.

valueType.name: Data read
valueType.description: The amount of data read from the file in this call.

eventType.name: File Write
eventType.description: Thread waiting due to a write to a File or FileChannel.

valueType.name: Data written
valueType.description: The amount of data written to the file in this call.

eventType.name: Object Allocation
eventType.description: Thread waiting to allocate an object or get a new TLA.

valueType.name: Class Name
valueType.description: Name of the class for the allocated object or the object that required a new TLA.

valueType.name: Size
valueType.description: Size of the object allocated.

valueType.name: New TLA
valueType.description: True if this is a request for a new TLA, false if this is an allocation of a large object.
